Package net.sf.jstuff.core.io

Class Processes.ProcessWrapper

java.lang.Object
net.sf.jstuff.core.io.Processes.ProcessWrapper
Enclosing class:
Processes
public static class Processes.ProcessWrapper extends Object
Wrapper around Process with convenience methods.

    • terminate

      public Processes.ProcessWrapper terminate(int gracePeriod, TimeUnit gracePeriodTimeUnit)
      Requests graceful termination of the process (SIGTERM) and immediately returns. If timeout is reached and process is still running, requests forceful termination (SIGKILL).

    • waitForExit

      Blocks until the process terminates.
